name: Bandits
description:
Bandits is a Tank Brawler Arena where you operate one of 8 tanks with their own play style and abilities. Matches are Straight-forward, dynamic, and very easy to get into; it's designed to reward strategy and careful positioning!

The gameplay is very Moba influenced, but it’s at its core a modernized classic tank game. It has awesome minimal visuals and effects, and very destructible environments!

Bandits has an Online Arena where you play with or against people online. 16 Solo missions, And the Battle arena: which is shared-screen 2-4 players games.
